metadata.name: Lisa Mayer
metadata.description:
Lisa Mayer, CEO of Boss Beauties.

Lisa is an entrepreneur, speaker, and philanthropist with a heart for equipping the next generation of women to design the life and career of their dreams, and is a ‘Mentor and Big Sister’ to thousands of Gen Z women in the My Social Canvas community worldwide. In 2021, Boss Beauties was born as an extension of the mentorship work Lisa had been doing since 2012 and within the first few months has already broken many glass ceilings. As the CEO of Boss Beauties and My Social Canvas, she has spoken at companies including Apple, Nordstrom, Rebecca Minkoff, Verizon, and NASDAQ. Her work has been featured in Forbes, Bloomberg Live, Cheddar TV, and ELLE Magazine.

This Boss Beauty of Lisa features the Caregiver Trait from the Boss Beauties Collection. Boss Beauties was founded just 3 months after Lisa gave birth to her son Hudson. As a new mom and entrepreneur, this trait is deeply personal to Lisa. The Caregiver was created to celebrate all the amazing Women caring for a child, or someone who is sick, elderly or disabled.
